column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I went to my grandmother 's house this summer and she loves to garden .
#id=2
#text=She asked me to help her plan a lemon tree in her front yard .
#id=3
#text=Since my grandmother was elderly and did n't have enough strength to shovel I did it instead .
#id=4
#text=I dug a hole big enough from the tree .
#id=5
#text=My grandmother had gone out to our local garden center and picked out a young lemon tree from their nursery .
#id=6
#text=I grabbed the lemon tree from the pot and placed the bottom of the tree into the hole .
#id=7
#text=I cover the roots and the hole with soil until it was all covered up .
#id=8
#text=My grandmother sprinkled fertilizer and other plant nutrients into the soil .
#id=9
#text=While she was doing that I grabbed the hose and turned the water on .
#text=I walked towards the lemon tree and sprinkled water into the soil .
#text=Hopefully the next time my grandmother and I meet to get to make lemonade .
